subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Francesca Schiavone defeated both Venus and Serena Williams in exhibition singles matches before the sisters rallied to win in doubles against Schiavone and Flavia Pennetta in Milan.
snippet: Francesca Schiavone defeated both Venus and Serena Williams in exhibition singles matches before the sisters rallied to win in doubles against Schiavone and Flavia Pennetta in Milan.
